newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures end pit trading mixed.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures end pit trading mixed.

text.p: Aug 22 - IMM currency futures finished pit trading mixed. Afternoon trade stayed light, with most units stalling inside ranges set during the morning. Marks stayed off after Buba eased but cut losses on ideas it could be last Buba cut. Can dollar rose after BoC ease, which also was viewed as last one. US July durable goods seen up 0.3 pct, up 0.8 pct ex-defense. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
